custom-sql.sql: SELECT TvT_TvShow.* FROM TvT_TvShow WHERE (YEAR(TvT_TvShow.tvShowPremierDate) LIKE ?)
SELECT TvT_TvShow.* FROM TvT_TvShow WHERE (TvT_TvShow.groupId = ?) AND (YEAR(TvT_TvShow.TvShowPremierDate) LIKE ?)
SELECT TvT_TvShow.* FROM TvT_TvShow WHERE (TvT_TvShow.groupId = ?) AND ( (YEAR(TvT_TvShow.TvShowPremierDate) LIKE ?) OR (TvT_TvShow.tvShowTitle LIKE ?) OR (TvT_TvShow.tvShowDescription LIKE ?) )

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM TvT_TvShow WHERE (TvT_TvShow.groupId = ?) AND ( (YEAR(TvT_TvShow.TvShowPremierDate) LIKE ?) OR (TvT_TvShow.tvShowTitle LIKE ?) OR (TvT_TvShow.tvShowDescription LIKE ?) )
